alert.note: Alert for Des Moines; Lee (Iowa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS QuadCities (Eastern Iowa and Northwestern Illinois - Quad Cities)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued December 15 at 9:21PM CST until December 15 at 10:00PM CST by NWS QuadCities
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1000 PM CST FOR HANCOCK...WESTERN HENDERSON...DES MOINES AND EASTERN LEE COUNTIES... At 921 PM CST, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Eliza to near West Point, moving east at 50 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Trained weather spotters. A 58 mph wind gust was measured at the Keokuk Airport at 906 PM. IMPACT...Expect considerable tree damage. Damage is likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. Locations impacted include... Burlington, Fort Madison, Keokuk, Carthage, Oquawka, Nauvoo, West Burlington, Hamilton, Warsaw, Mediapolis, La Harpe, Dallas City, Danville, Stronghurst, Bowen, Middletown, Carman, Gladstone, Terre Haute and West Point. TORNADO...POSSIBLE THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...OBSERVED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 1100 PM CST for west central Illinois...southeastern Iowa...and northeastern Missouri. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a sturdy building.
